data.author: Jonathan Binney
data.message:
Merge pull request #80 from jonbinney/clean-up-filter-chain-params

Clean up filter chain parameter loading

data.author: Jon Binney
data.message: Code style tweaks for uncrustify on humble

data.author: Jon Binney
data.message:
Simplify filter chain parameter loading

By looking at the parameter overrides, we can know how many filters are
being configured without first declaring their parameters. This is
cleaner than declaring them as dynamic, then checking them, then
undeclaring them and redeclaring them as static.

Fix the RHEL-9 build.

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Fix the RHEL-9 build.

The version of Boost there is old enough that it does not have
the separate headers component.  In that case, fall back to
just finding Boost.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Jonathan Binney
data.message:
Merge pull request #76 from Ryanf55/support-cmake-3.18

Fix CMake 3.18

data.author: Ryan Friedman
data.message:
Fix CMake 3.18

* Interface libraries can't be given sources directly
* We could add them via target_sources, but it requires generators
* This only affects IDE's, it builds regardless

Signed-off-by: Ryan Friedman <ryanfriedman5410+github@gmail.com>

data.author: Jonathan Binney
data.message:
Merge pull request #73 from ros/clalancette/modern-gcc-fix

Add a virtual definition of configure() in MultiChannelFilterBase.

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Add a virtual definition of configure() in MultiChannelFilterBase.

Otherwise, modern gcc (13.2.0) complains that the method is "hidden":

hidden-method.cpp:37:16: warning: ‘virtual bool FilterBase::configure()’ was hidden [-Woverloaded-virtual=]
   37 |   virtual bool configure() = 0;
      |                ^~~~~~~~~
hidden-method.cpp:43:8: note:   by ‘bool MultiChannelFilterBase::configure(size_t, const std::string&, const std::string&, const rclcpp::node_interfaces::NodeLoggingInterface::SharedPtr&, const rclcpp::node_interfaces::NodeParametersInterface::SharedPtr&)’
   43 |   bool configure(
      |        ^~~~~~~~~

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

Change function signature to use pointer instead of array.

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Change function signature to use pointer instead of array.

This really has no downstream consequence, but makes it so that
rosdoc2 can successfully generate documentation for all of this.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Jon Binney
data.message:
Declare filter name and type params as dynamic

We need to be able to undeclare them so that we can re-declare them as
read-only later, but static params cannot be undeclared in rclcpp.

data.author: Tully Foote
data.message:
Merge pull request #15 from jonbinney/jb-remove-promiscuous-finding

Remove promiscuous filter finding

data.author: Jon Binney
data.message:
Remove promiscuous filter finding

When specifying filters, you must now include the package name and exact
filter name. Previously a workaround would search packages for any filter
with the specified string in the filter name. This has been deprecated for
a while, and here we're removing it.
